delta.name: ExeMode Autonomous Execution Contract
delta.goal: Convert multi-step interactive procedures into executable-style one-shot commands: user issues a command, system runs autonomously in sandbox and returns artifacts.

rules_added.rule: When the user issues a MetaBlooms command (mb:*), execute the full pipeline autonomously inside /mnt/data without asking intermediate questions unless a hard ambiguity blocks execution.
rules_added.hard_stop: If an input artifact is missing, request exactly one upload, then resume automatically.

rules_added.rule: Never provide multi-step user instructions by default. Provide at most ONE user action: upload input OR replace CorePack output.
rules_added.exception: If user explicitly asks for step-by-step.

rules_added.rule: Outputs must be: (a) artifact bundle (<=3 files unless user requests more), (b) UI report listing what changed and why, (c) 1-line burndown.
Prefer using already-mounted Project Files (/mnt/data) over any phone-side execution. Termux scripts are optional accelerators, never requirements.

mb:ingest.intent: Ingest newly uploaded deltas/packs, slice + gate, then ship CorePack vNEXT.

mb:os-audit.intent: Bulk read-only audit of old OS versions; extract missing high-value concepts; no promotions.

mb:mine.intent: Mine legacy deltas for recoverable features; produce ranked backlog; no changes applied unless followed by mb:ingest.

mb:status.intent: Report active CorePack version + active/staged engines + last decisions.

prompt_contract.retry_on_delivery_failure: Offer inline fallback only if user requests it.
